texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Auto Pay lets you pay the Congestion Charge and Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ) charge automatically each month."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
You need to create a London Road User Charging account . (Already have an account? Sign in now.)
Then, to set up Auto Pay, you will need your:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Vehicle registration details","Bank or payment card details"]}
The Â£10 registration charge for each vehicle added to Auto Pay must be paid every year. You don't have to pay this charge immediately - it will be added to your first statement.
